text: Thanks again for the help yesterday.

So for some reason our featured articles are showing the same read time as the blog post they're on. I looked in the huble code and <em class="time-to-read">(<span class="eta"></span> read <span class="ucWords hide" style=""></span>)</em> this is all I see not sure how they're pulling that read time.
Maybe a JavaScript file is generating the time
